# DocumentObservation.Container.Text.Alignment

**Enumeration**

The different text alignment types within a container.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Alignment
```

## Getting the alignment

- **DocumentObservation.Container.Text.Alignment.center**: Text aligns horizontally to the center of the container.
- **DocumentObservation.Container.Text.Alignment.leading**: Text aligns to the left edge of the container.
- **DocumentObservation.Container.Text.Alignment.trailing**: Lines aligned with a right edge within the container.

## Inspecting the text

- **boundingRegion**: A polygon that defines the boundary of text.
- **textAlignment**: The alignment of the text within its container.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
